TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RequestSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustMessage

summary.span: 表示请求安全标记的 wst:RequestSecurity 元素（RST）。

span.span: Represents the wst:RequestSecurityToken element (RST), which is used to request a security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wst： RequestSecurityToken 元素 (message) 包含用于从 security token service (STS) 请求安全令牌的参数和属性。The wst:RequestSecurityToken element (message) contains the parameters and properties used to request a security token from a security token service (STS). 消息 (或元素) 缩写为 RST。The message (or element) is abbreviated as RST. 类包含表示 RST 的元素的属性。The class contains properties that represent the elements of the RST. RST 可以形成对应于 WS-TRUST 定义的任何请求绑定的请求;例如，颁发绑定、续订绑定、验证绑定或取消绑定。An RST can form a request that corresponds to any of the request bindings defined by WS-Trust; for example, the Issuance binding, the Renewal binding, the Validate binding, or the Cancel binding. 类中的许多属性 对应于这些元素，这些元素仅在这些绑定所定义的特定类型的请求中出现。Many of the properties in the class correspond to elements that are present only in specific kinds of requests as defined by these bindings. 根据特定对象表示的请求类型 或其表示的特定请求中存在的参数，该对象的某些属性可能是 `null` 。Depending on the kind of request a particular object represents or the parameters present in the specific request that it represents, some properties of the object may be `null`. STS 在包含 wst： RequestSecurityTokenResponse 元素 (RSTR) 的消息中返回对请求的响应。The STS returns a response to the request in a message that contains a wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse element (RSTR). 此消息由 类表示。This message is represented by the class. [!INCLUDE[wif_wstrust_ref](~/includes/wif-wstrust-ref-md.md)] ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了一些自定义类，使你能够处理 (SWT) 的简单 Web 令牌，并包括能够为 SWT 令牌提供服务的被动 STS 的实现。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. STS 由派生自的类实现 。The STS is implemented by a class that is derived from . 类中从其标记颁发管道调用的许多方法都将 对象作为其参数。Many of the methods of the class that are called from its token issuance pipeline take a object as one if their parameters. 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例的信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index). 下面的代码示例演示 方法的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the method. 方法采用 作为其参数之一，此参数的属性用于设置 方法返回的对象的属性。The method takes a as one of its parameters and properties of this parameter are used to set properties on the object that is returned by the method. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#4)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#5)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ ActAs { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置请求者尝试充当的标识的安全令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the security token for the identity that the requestor is attempting to act as.

value.span: 表示该标识的请求者正在尝试。

span.span: A that represents the identity the requestor is attempting to act as.

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： ActAs 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:ActAs element. 此可选元素支持委托方案，并指示请求方正在请求作为另一个标识。This optional element supports delegation scenarios and indicates that the requestor is making the request to act as another identity. 此元素在 WS-TRUST 1.4 中引入。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 此属性的 `null` 请求不涉及委托。This property is `null` in requests that don't involve delegation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::AdditionalContext ^ AdditionalContext { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::AdditionalContext ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::AdditionalContext ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置请求的附加上下文信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the additional context information for the request.

value.span: 包含请求的附加上下文信息的 。

span.span: An that contains the additional context information for the request.

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 auth： AdditionalContext 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the auth:AdditionalContext element. 此可选元素提供 security token service (STS) 可以在令牌颁发过程中使用的其他信息。This optional element provides additional information that the security token service (STS) can use in the token issuance process.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ CancelTarget { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 WS-Trust 取消请求中取消的令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the token to be canceled in a WS-Trust cancel request.

value.span: 一个 ，包含要取消的令牌。

span.span: A that contains the token to be cancelled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： CancelTarget 元素的内容。Represents the contents of a wst:CancelTarget element. 此元素携带要在 WS-TRUST 取消请求中取消的令牌的相关信息。This element carries the information about the token to be cancelled in a WS-Trust cancel request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Claims As RequestClaimCollection

summary.span: 获取客户端（请求者）请求的声明类型。

span.span: Gets the claim types requested by the client (requestor).

value.span: 一个 ，包含所需的声明。

span.span: A that contains the requested claims.

value.span: 默认值为空集合。

span.span: The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst：声明元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Claims element. 此可选元素请求客户端请求的特定声明类型集。This optional element requests the set of specific claim types requested by the client.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ComputedKeyAlgorithm { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 当计算密钥被用于公开的标记时，获取表示拟用期望算法的 URI。

span.span: Gets a URI that represents the desired algorithm to use when computed keys are used for issued tokens.

value.span: 字符串包含表示密钥算法的 URI。

span.span: A string that contains the URI that represents the computed key algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： ComputedKeyAlgorithm 元素。Represents the wst:ComputedKeyAlgorithm element. 此可选元素指定一个 URI，该 URI 表示在将计算键用于已颁发的令牌时要使用的所需算法。This optional element specifies a URI that represents the desired algorithm to use when computed keys are used for issued tokens.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定是否应将颁发的令牌标记为可委派的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if the issued token should be marked as delegatable.

value.span: 如果已发布标记为可委托，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the issued token is delegatable; otherwise, .

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： Delegatable 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Delegatable element. 此可选元素指示返回的令牌可能 delegatable 到另一方。This optional element indicates that the returned token may be delegatable to another party. 此元素在 WS-TRUST 1.4 中引入。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 此属性与属性结合使用 。This property used in conjunction with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ DelegateTo { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应向其委派已颁发令牌的标识。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity to which the issued token should be delegated.

value.span: 表示应委托已发布的标志的标识的 。

span.span: A that represents the identity to which the issued token should be delegated.

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： DelegateTo 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:DelegateTo element. 此可选元素指示已颁发的令牌将委托给指定的标识。This optional element indicates that the issued token be delegated to the specified identity. 此元素在 WS-TRUST 1.4 中引入。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 此属性的 `null` 请求不涉及委托。This property is `null` in requests that don't involve delegation. 此属性与属性结合使用 。This property is used in conjunction with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ Encryption { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置令牌信息以及加密时要使用的密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets information on the token and key to use when encrypting.

value.span: 一个包含加密信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the encrypting information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： Encryption 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Encryption element. 此可选元素指示已颁发安全令牌中的任何返回的机密都应该针对指定的令牌进行加密。This optional element indicates that any returned secrets in issued security tokens should be encrypted for the specified token.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Forwardable As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Forwardable { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.Forwardable : Nullable<bool> with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指定是否应将颁发的令牌标记为可转发的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if the issued token should be marked forwardable.

value.span: 如果已发布标记为可向前的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the issued token is forwardable; otherwise, .

value.span: 可以为 。

span.span: Can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： Forwardable 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Forwardable element. 此可选元素指示返回的令牌是否绑定到请求者的计算机或服务 (由 `false` 值) 指示。This optional element indicates whether the returned token is bound to the requestor's computer or service (indicated by a `false` value). 此元素在 WS-TRUST 1.4 中引入。This element is introduced in WS-Trust 1.4. 此属性与属性结合使用 。This property used in conjunction with the property.

span.span: A that contains the address of the issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： Issuer 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Issuer element. 此可选元素标识 wst： OnBehalfOf 元素中指定的令牌的颁发者。This optional element identifies the issuer of the token that is specified in the wst:OnBehalfOf element.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ OnBehalfOf { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置代表发出请求的标识的令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the token for the identity on behalf of which the request is being made.

value.span: 包含要请求的标识标志的 。

span.span: A that contains the token of the identity for which the request is being made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： OnBehalfOf 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:OnBehalfOf element. 此可选元素指示请求者代表其他标识发出请求。This optional element indicates that the requestor is making the request on behalf of another identity.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Participants ^ Participants { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Participants ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Participants ^ value); };

span.span: A that contains the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： ProofEncryption 元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:ProofEncryption element. 此可选元素包含用于加密校验密钥的令牌。This optional element contains the token to be used to encrypt the proof key.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Renewing ^ Renewing { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Renewing ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::Renewing ^ value); };

span.span: Returns that contains the renew semantics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst：正在续订元素的内容。Represents the contents of the wst:Renewing element. 此可选元素指定 WS-TRUST 续订请求的续订语义。This optional element specifies the renew semantics for a WS-Trust renew request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ RenewTarget { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenElement ^ value); };

value.span: 一个 ，包含要续订的令牌。

span.span: A that contains the token to be renewed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： RenewTarget 元素的内容。Represents the contents of a wst:RenewTarget element. 此元素携带要在 WS-TRUST 续订请求中续订的令牌的相关信息。This element carries the information about the token to be renewed in a WS-Trust renew request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::RequestSecurityToken ^ SecondaryParameters { System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::RequestSecurityToken ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Protocols::WSTrust::RequestSecurityToken ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置其请求者不是发出方的参数。

span.span: Gets or sets parameters for which the requestor is not the originator.

value.span: 包含请求的次要参数的 ，即该请求者不是发信方的参数。

span.span: A that contains secondary parameters for the request; that is, parameters for which the requestor is not the originator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： SecondaryParameters 元素的内容。Represents the contents of a wst:SecondaryParameters element. 此可选元素包含请求方不是其发起方的参数。This optional element contains parameters for which the requestor is not the originator. STS 可以根据其策略选择使用此元素中的值。An STS may choose to use the values found in this element based on its policy.

value.span: 包含要验证的标志。

span.span: A that contains the token to be validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 wst： ValidateTarget 元素的内容。Represents the contents of a wst:ValidateTarget element. 此元素携带要在 WS-TRUST 验证请求中验证的令牌的相关信息。This element carries the information about the token to be validated in a WS-Trust validate request.
